description: The Netball Super League sends "love and support" to Leah Middleton after her injury sees Cardiff Dragons' game against Birmingham Panthers abandoned.
title: Leah Middleton: 'Love and support' for Cardiff Dragons player after injury
title_page: Leah Middleton: 'Love and support' for Cardiff Dragons player after injury - BBC Sport
maintext:
The Netball Super League has sent "love and support" to Leah Middleton after she suffered an injury which saw Cardiff Dragons' game against Birmingham Panthers abandoned.
Dragons were hosting Panthers at Cardiff's House of Sport on Friday, but the decision was taken to postpone the game because of Welsh international Middleton's injury.
"Our thoughts are with Leah, and we're wishing her a smooth and speedy recovery â€“ we're all behind you, Leah," Dragons said on social media.
Netball Super League also posted on social media, saying: "On behalf of the Netball Super League and everyone within the wider netball family, we are sending all our love and support to the amazing Leah Middleton at Cardiff Dragons following her injury in tonight's match.
"We are with you every step of the way."
